title: El Niño effects in the eastern Pacific

content.question: During an El Niño–Southern Oscillation event, which of the following best describes conditions in the eastern part of the tropical Pacific Ocean (e.g., near Peru and Ecuador)?

choices.label: Sea Surface Temperature Rainfall Low Low
Sea Surface Temperature Rainfall Low High
Sea Surface Temperature Rainfall High Low
Sea Surface Temperature Rainfall High High
Sea Surface Temperature Rainfall High Normal

content.answer: Sea Surface Temperature Rainfall High High
